column4: hi, question: I'm trying to update and existing xmltv installation to the newest version. but then I apt-get, it tells me newest version installed
BUT, i need a newer version that probably isn't packaged
Terminal, sudo apt-get autoremove and after that start again. Perhaps U get the newestend
Terminal, sudo apt-get autoremove and after that start again ... no reboot, sorry...is automatic and reading new sources
